Taurus.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the second sign of the zodiac, represented by a bull, which some people believe affects the character and life of people born between April 21 and May 21
Taurus.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who was born between April 21 and May 21
Taurus.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a computer system for buying and selling shares, that the LONDON STOCK EXCHANGE started to develop but never completed. It has been replaced by CREST.
